data.app_name: Understanding Heart Attack in Women  - Sit and Learn
data.description:
Step into the world of immersive health or patient education with the module designed for a comfortable sitting experience. Tailored for adult users, healthcare professionals and students it offers a realistic, interactive exploration of heart attack without complex  medical jargon. (It can be used by both women and men. It has a focus on women atypical symptoms)
Experience the 3D anatomy, case study, signs, & symptoms, prevention and treatments path  and measure your radial pulse rate with simulation in a virtual home environment that provides you basic understanding of what a heart attack is. It is recommended as a tool for all ages or as a guided module with a nurse/trained caregiver.
Perfect for student training, patient education, or home training programs, this module is a must-have tool for anyone looking to enhance their basic understanding and awareness of cardiac diseases based on patient experience.

Features:
Content Medically Reviewed by Top Woman Cardiologist
Comfortable Sitting Mode:
Interactive 3D Heart Module: with voice. Experience the  anatomy of the heart with fun facts
Deep dive into Knowledge section to understand what happens during a heart attack, how it may be prevented, including signs and symptoms.
Answer a Quiz
Measure your own heart rate: Learn how to measure your radial pulse rate and what it may mean.
Earn a Badge !
Ideal for self paced or guided education for 
    Women Patient  at Home/Clinics
    Higher Education Students
    Clinician CME/CE courses
